website_summaries.verdict: A hair tape that delivers on its promise to keep your extensions in place.
pros: You can work out every day and swim without worrying about your extensions
cons: You will definitely need a solvent remover when you're ready to take your extensions off

customer_reviews.title: Nearly impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible! They are impossible to get out without losing a ton of hair. Even after removing them with oil, doing a hot oil treatment, shampoo, conditioner, leave in, and blow dry my hair was still sticky and tangled. Spend a little extra money and get something good.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: These work great if you use them correctly!
customer_reviews.text: I am in in salon stylist, and I love this tape for fine hair! Some of my tapes can be difficult to remove, especially with the tiny bit of hair in them on a fine, thin hair install, and you don't want to break one hair on your clients head! These do need a little pinch with a flat iron. 2.5 mos. for growout, not slippage! Extension Release removes this tape quickly, a little Weft Release oil for easy sliding down the shaft here and there!
customer_reviews.author: Caree C.

customer_reviews.title: As if tape in your hair wasn't scary enough...
customer_reviews.text: They held on so well, easy to use like any other. The problem came when I attempted to take them out. . I've used tape ins many times before so this was a shock. The tape stuck to each other and to my hair wonderfully. However, not my tracks. So when I removed the extensions, the tape stayed put. In my hair. . Took me about 4 hours to get all the tape out and still had terrible sticky residue all over my hair. Caused alot of breakage and I've been too scared to put them back in. The picture was maybe only a third of it. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: MUST buy for at home extension installation.
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t go to the salon and use their extensions & tape, this is the holy grail for at home extension install. Do not trust whatever they use on pre-taped hair extensions. They will fail you. Just buy these and adhere right over top of the tape that they come with. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Chasteen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This tape is awesome. The best I've found n used yet. I HV bought 2sets of this n its perfect every time. Easy to apply, stays n til I remove it n Yes easy to remove from my tape n hair n easy to reapply new. I love these n they r way inexpensive for how many u receive, how long they last & how well they work. If u use tape n hair extensions these are a MUST have. Great product. Also when I remove the hair the tape stays in tact in never is in my hair may be the awesome spray on tape remover I use.
customer_reviews.author: shinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great! After I had my tape-in extensions put in and moved up once by a professional, I decided to save some money and DIY it. With the help of my best friend (and this tape!) we did it one Saturday and they’ve stayed in longer than when the professional did it!
customer_reviews.author: Lander

customer_reviews.title: No!  It doesn't bond, not even to another brand of good tape. It's horrible. Pulling apart or separating on day two.
customer_reviews.text: This is really bad tape. With all the time and prep it takes to do the job, this double sided tape ruins the job. I've read that it's probably not real walker tape. I've never used walker tape before. There are other tapes that work great and hold completely and smoothly for a full month with no problems. This is not that tape.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Smith

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: They do not come out. You need to take out tape in extensions every month and move up to avoid breakage and these would not come out. They left a horrible film in the hair, my hands and all tools used. Ill stick with my regular brand in the future
customer_reviews.author: John carbajal

customer_reviews.title: Possibly repackaged?
customer_reviews.text: This tape has not been working well for me. Lots of slipping, separating and rippling. I pulled out my last sheet of Walker tape I bought somewhere else and could see that the white paper backing is very different, much thinner and not as opaque, than the tape from this seller. In my photo, what I'm calling authentic Walker tape I bought elsewhere is on the left, and the tape on the right is from this seller. It came in Walker packaging but I'm wondering if the tape was repackaged or maybe the packaging itself is fake? Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Great tape
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion is really phenomenal on this tape. None of them remove easily, you have to use rubbing alcohol or oil and rub it into the seam of the tape you want to remove. You let the alcohol or oil do its work as you pull ever so gently to encourage the tape to loosen. The last thing you want to do is panic and rip your hair. The tapes all come out if you do this. The main thing is it’s better than the tape the extensions I have originally came with so I’m pleased. They’re also super thin and lay nice and flat.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Drucker

customer_reviews.title: These are crap
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the bad reviews. These do NOT work. It's day 3 and all of my extensions are separating. I spent so much time coloring, washing, drying, and sticking this horrible tape onto my extensions for nothing! Now i have to remove them and start all over again (with a different brand, of course.) For the record, I know how to prep my hair properly, and I know how to install properly. These just don't do what they are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: I've been using these for the past few months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for the past few months and they hold up very well. I stay away from exercise and showering for 2-3 days to let them bond.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I just took out the extensions I used this tape on 3 days ago and I was super pleased. I had them in almost 6 weeks. Not one of them slipped or started to separate. Removal was easy. I've worn extensions on and off and I love these even better than the professional ones the salon used.
customer_reviews.author: amandazing

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely horrible. I have never had an extension slip and I have had 2 come completely out in only two weeks! I ignored the negative reviews because I assumed people didn’t use it correctly or did not use heat. I was wrong and wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!:)
customer_reviews.text: So I like this product personally I think it sticks very well I have had it in for 3 weeks so far and I have not had really any issues. Why only concern is when I did try to remove it it was a little bit difficult to remove, but if you know what you're doing you will be fine. Worth the money that is for sure . I wash my hair once a week and its been great for 3 washes so far !
customer_reviews.author: Darya Ovechkina

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: These strips were so difficult to get to in the first place. When placed on my skin to hold a wig they did not hold on to the wig but attached themselves to my skin and took every solvent and bit of alcohol I had in the house to remove. When I used the stocking cap method, again did not stick to the lace front or my regular wig to keep them in place. Got stuck on the cap though and was very difficult to get off. Took out some hair. Would never ever use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ithica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Extensions Fell Out
customer_reviews.text: I used these tapes after I ran out of the ones that came with my extensions and they did not work as well. The edges of the tape started to fold over so I had to make sure to smooth out my hair throughout the day otherwise you can see the tape. Eventually some of the tape also started falling out. One of my extensions complete came out.
customer_reviews.author: Fanny Cherng

customer_reviews.title: WORST WORST WORST! Expect to lose all your hair
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews saying how hard these were to remove! These tapes are absolutely horrible! Ive worn tape ins on and off for years and never had anything close to this happen. Had them in 4 days and the extensions started to fall out in the shower. Then realized the tape was still in my hair! Took hours to get them all out (with my stylist help) then still sticky residue. Pulled out tons of my hair when we removed them. do NOT buy these! They will ruin your hair
customer_reviews.author: Terah C.

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure you use it correctly!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, you just have to use it perfectly. I purchased this because my salon is currently closed due to Covid & I have been desperate to have my tape-ins back in! IF: you place tape on BOTH pieces of hair to make the sandwich WITH the perfect amount of hair in-between (not too much because the tape won’t adhere & not too little because your hair will break) this stuff lasts just as long as the Bellami tape used at my salon.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Dingson

customer_reviews.title: DO.NOT.BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE!!!!! Wow. I chose to ignore the bad reviews and take the few good ones enough to want to try them. Literally a half hour after re taping them all they’re coming apart. I brush my hair and the hair starts to slip. So so awful. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Awful , I bought these for the convince of not having to go to the beauty supply store and they were awful. My client washed her hair one time and they literally just fell out of her hair. So imagine all that time and money I wasted and spent redoing an entire set of extensions. Then to top it off when you go to remove them from the extensions they just fall apart so taking them off is just as much of a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. These did not last and were professionally used and taken care of. Super dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE R BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Did not stick at all!!
customer_reviews.text: This tape did not stick to the hair extension AT ALL. I bought it because all the positive reviews but I could not get the extension to stick to anything but my hand and my hair so I had tape wads everywhere I had to get out. I do not recommend this product AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Erin singleterry

customer_reviews.title: Best one I could find
customer_reviews.text: I tried another brand that had more tapes and was less expensive. I regretted it. These are the best in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Is not walker tape and smaller then it says!!! Total scam!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Shiny but strong
customer_reviews.text: Tape works good, washed my hair 3 times and they are still in place, my only problem is you can see them, they are shiny and that makes it hard to blend on the crown of my head. My daughter asked me why I had tape in my hair LOL. That would be my only complaint....
customer_reviews.author: Nlizr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tape that doesn’t hold.
customer_reviews.text: This tape is really cheap. I waited 3 days after installing to wash my extensions and more than half fell out after washing. The tape isn’t the high quality tape with the fibery texture, it’s just plastic double sided tape. If you want a temporary solution where you can take them out in a few days this would be a good option, but other than that it’s a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica V.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!! I’ve been using these for my tape extensions for many years.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best adhesives I have tried... and I’ve been getting extensions for almost 10 years now! Make sure you purchase a good adhesive remover to get the gunk out when your ready to. Hand sanitizer works as well to remove them in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Double-Sided Tape - Durable, Easy to Remove, and Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I've worn several brands of tape in extensions for many years and install them myself. These are my go-to double side tapes when I need replacements. They fit all standard size tape wefts without need for trimming, they are easy to peel and apply, they hold very well, and they remove easily with tape bond remover. The price is incredible compared to what the "brand" name companies charge.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pez

customer_reviews.title: Nice amount for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice replacement for tapes hair extensions. I’ll update the review when I see how long they last on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Zailyn Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: They work just as good as any others that are “name brand”. Sometimes these can make a sticky mess, I use 91% rubbing alcohol to take them out of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have used tape ins for around 3-4 years now and I replace the tape as many times as possible. This tape honestly didn’t do a great job. I had high hopes when I first applied it but, after the first time washing my hair they started sliding, most ended up coming out with in a week. I tried again and used more hair in between and also pressed quickly with my straightener. This did help but, I had an extremely hard time removing after. The adhesive became gummy like and I just would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Karly Mathews

customer_reviews.title: This is great to buy for easy applications
customer_reviews.text: Great tape to buy in a pinch! This was a "fast buy" just to get something to put in my friends hair extensions. It has been about 2 months and the tape is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work well in my hair. Lasted about two days before it started slip or fall out completely. Yes I had them professionally installed and wasted 60 for 3 days at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Some of my tape in extensions fall out after I shower so I had to get these to tape them back in and it worked great. Very easy to use saves me time in between trips to the salon.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Strong bonds They absolutely do not slip
customer_reviews.text: These bonds are amazingly strong bonds the only thing that I did not like about them is that they seem to be a little bit thicker and also the thickness then makes your head sore a little bit . But if you want bonds it will stay in your hair these are the ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorites thus far
customer_reviews.text: These are genuinely the best tapes I’ve used thus far. I am a stylist and work at a salon, I do extension application weekly! I use these on myself and clients! They can be tough to remove without an actual tape in bond remover, my personal choice is C-22 solvent. I’ve had the bonds last upwards on 12 weeks before needing removal due to growth! An absolute must have!
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Heck yes
customer_reviews.text: These bitches weeerrrkkkk it's insane they held on just as good as the tape that originally came with my extensions I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Greatest tape!
customer_reviews.text: This is really good tape, it is better than most kinds, I use 18 “ tape ins and it’s lasted me atleast over 2 months if installed correctly!!! I honestly recommend this product!!! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittmakesyourhairgorgeous

customer_reviews.title: Stuck in my hair, might have to shave my head
customer_reviews.text: They stay in your hair very well but when i went to get them taken out even with tape remover the tape stuck in my hair and wont come out. I might have to shave my head becuase its just a big mat of tape stuck in my hair as if it was melted will never buy again very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Hope sweeten

customer_reviews.title: Sticks incredibly well
customer_reviews.text: It was an AMAZING stick even with buying an oil type or the other stuff to remove however was awful lol but that’s what you get for getting wearing them I guess right?
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Carrie

customer_reviews.title: They Lie it shines like a lighthouse
customer_reviews.text: They advertised "no shine". Its the shiniest substance in earth. I'm not sure what planet they're living on but I can assure you that they never should have advertise that they coulda just said smaller strips and sticky... But to advertise no shine and a habit shinier than anything else that I've ever seen is beyond disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great tapes!
customer_reviews.text: These tapes held pretty good. Don't use conditioner before applying. Let stay on hair at least 2 days before washing. Then they are great! Easy to remove with oil remover.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Greenhalgh

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy application! First time using this brand and they work pretty good! Going on 3 weeks with my extensions in and they still feel tight and secure. Definitely will be buying this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: They suck
customer_reviews.text: These suck I would’ve been better off using some cheap stickers from Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: Would not use these again since they were very difficult to remove; too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: KTCowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Man do these realllllly stick! Love the price and how easy they are to use, but I definitely have a hard time removing them without hurting my clients:/
customer_reviews.author: Addi G.

customer_reviews.title: works very well at home for doing it yourself
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to use, especially if you are installing your own extensions at home. However the adhesive is almost too strong and makes it very hard to get out of your hair, even after washing a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: aubri

customer_reviews.title: Great if only needed for a week
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use many different brands, not satisfied with these as they started coming unstuck in less than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Keely Gore 🔮The Neon Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Great price ! Kinda sticky but not as bad as Bombshell tape to remove !
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, forgiving, held up well!
customer_reviews.text: These were so easy to use and very forgiving for the amount of hair I put in. They survived well until I took them out over a month later.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Changes made, but not for the better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these again because I had such good luck with them several months ago. It appears, however, that they’ve changed the formula or something, because these new ones do not adhere together. I applied 6 pieces, and didn’t wash my hair for 36 hours, and all 6 pulled out. I could tell a difference when I pulled them off the plastic sheeting. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Senatra

customer_reviews.title: Tape didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: This tape did not hold my hair for anything! Never had extensions that slipped so badly than with this tape. I am using the rest to secure gift cards into my Christmas cards for the holidays. Seems to hold up great for that. But won’t use these for my extensions again
customer_reviews.author: K Graham

customer_reviews.title: Win win
customer_reviews.text: The best easiest and hold great and easily remove with alcohol I will continue to purchase and I say you should too it’s a win and not even expensive
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can’t say I love or hate this product because I didn’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Vizcarra

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I never give bad reviews but I had to throw out my extensions after using these . They are so sticky and made big knots in my hair
customer_reviews.author: lora southerland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I used these for my tape on extensions and they hold so well. I’m able to brush my hair like normal. Only problem was when I put one in cus one wasn’t in right and showered right after it came out but I guess that’s kind of expected. Other than that they’re great no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH BUYING
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking it would be good quality but I was wrong my extensions came off the glue doesn’t hold after only 3 weeks the glue came off the extensions and the glue got stuck on my hair I luckily had purchased the glue remover for when I was ready to remove my hair extensions there for I removed the glue recedure from my hair
customer_reviews.author: yuriko gomez

customer_reviews.title: So far GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Been in my hair for about 2 weeks now. They are AMAZING so far! So much strength for the price. I really was impressed because normally I would be very nervous about trying something like this from amazon but these really work well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not that happy with quality.
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot thinner the the last ones I ordered from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Barkus

customer_reviews.title: They are horrible!
customer_reviews.text: If I can save anyone the headache and grief from purchasing this abhorrent product then this review was worth my time!!! They do not stick! The extensions will fall out immediately or at the worse time usually within a few days! They leave behind a sticky and very hard to remove glue residue in your hair! Never again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charleen ricks

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This tape DOES NOT WORK. WHAT A MESS. I’ve been doing extensions almost 20 years and this stuff is a dumpster fire waste of time. It doesn’t matter if you use clarifying shampoo three times with no conditioner or product before applying, use heat to press, wait 48 hrs to wash... it just doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia K.

customer_reviews.title: Great tapes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several hair tapes, including the more expensive, high-end brands, and this one is the best I’ve found. Inexpensive and my extensions don’t move at all!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea De Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these tapes. They hold on very well and come off clean. Other tapes do not hold as well as these and the tape stays on the hair. These are worth the money
customer_reviews.author: PrinKuBas

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sticky. Hair extensions were falling out and was able to easily put them back in to get longer use
customer_reviews.author: Anna Friedkin

customer_reviews.title: Tape isn’t good
customer_reviews.text: Tape doesn’t work! I’m at the salon right now getting my extensions put in ! An they keep falling out as she is trying to straighten my hair
customer_reviews.author: taisia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible adhesion. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worst replacement tapes I have purchased. I’ve been wearing extensions for five years and never have I had them come out like this. Every wash they come out. Very annoying. (Even after curing with hot iron). Save your money. Sally’s beauty tapes which I think are satin strands are fabulous compared to these.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Granheim

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your Money
customer_reviews.text: I had my extensions placed professionally and with 9 days every single extension slid out! Talk about expensive and frustrating! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Hack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hair glue tape
customer_reviews.text: Good tape I use them to make my clip in hair extensions they works great
customer_reviews.author: Kikapoo

customer_reviews.title: My new go to tapes
customer_reviews.text: Works just as it should. They hold well and stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to remove and left residue in spots where used. These are in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid

customer_reviews.title: Another bad product, trying to peel each tab off was ...
customer_reviews.text: Another bad product, trying to peel each tab off was difficult the back piece kept coming off on each one and each piece wasn't cut far enough though making it hard to pull off. Horrible product don't waste your money .
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.. not very sticky even with heat!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars for the “easy to remove” portion of the review, as they came out as easy as a hair clip without leaving any glue stuck to the hair. I knew they wouldn’t stick well before I even applied it- good tape plasters to your finger when you touch it, this kind didn’t even stick!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L'Hommedieu

customer_reviews.title: Hell no
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure if i got some old tape? But none of my strips were sticky or stuck to the skin. I cleaned the skin with 91% alcohol. Used the recommended scalp protector and still nothing. Everything in my pack was stuck together. I went through the whole pack trying to get it to stick. It kept lifting. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Quality replacement tape
customer_reviews.text: We are happy at the salon with the quality and ease of this replacement tape and we have had no complaints from clients when replacing the tape on their wefts.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: One happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, this is my first time using tape in extensions but it was super easy to use this product for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: arsineh

customer_reviews.title: Quality and quantity
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for applying tinsel In hair . The quality and quantity were impressive
customer_reviews.author: darryn bezeck

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it, the strips are so tiny and doesn’t hold
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Swann

customer_reviews.title: Forever customer
customer_reviews.text: Y’all. These tabs STAY put. Won’t ever use another brand again
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Adhesion could be better but for the price, very good and easy to remove without damaging your natural hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Trombley

customer_reviews.title: It wasn’t the same..
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this twice now. The first time it looked like the pic and was amazing. This time it’s different and I’ve only been wearing a couple days and some are coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and order it every other month.
customer_reviews.author: Bellabell

customer_reviews.title: Separation issues
customer_reviews.text: After the first wash I had about 4 peices come out. The rest stayed for about 3 weeks no problem and after that the ones around the crown of my head and by my face started to separate. Didnt have any problems with any in the back of my head though!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I get this tape on a regular! Sticks well. Even after washing my hair. Tip: Olive oil works best to get the adhesive off of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tape ever
customer_reviews.text: Best tape ever! These tapes stay on until you remove them. The only problem is they are VERY sticky and a little bit hard to remove. Once you remove the extension, you need to remove the tape from your hair. On the plus side, you will never be embarrassed by an extension falling out :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniac

customer_reviews.title: Strong adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I have Bellami tape in Hairextension, but I use this tape to reapply it! Love the strong adhesive, so high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Gyarmati

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good hold kept in my hair perfectly for 8 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: hulachristie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This tape was slippy at first but once it got sandwiched it was fine. Also if you use a straightener and clamp down on the tape it makes it slip less. It was also fairly easy to take out using baby oil. Pretty good tapes for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn Raver

customer_reviews.title: You must have these if you have tape in extensions!
customer_reviews.text: Super strong and so easy to use! Extensions have been in 6 weeks and not ONE has come loose. When I put the extensions in with the tape that came on them the first time several came loose and fell out. I even used conditioner and all are in strong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as the name brand Babe ones. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast and is sufficient small and thin for tape in extensions.
customer_reviews.author: LUX

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This tape is so much better than the expensive tape I bought from top hair extensions brands. It lasts long, it super thin and doesn’t slide!
customer_reviews.author: laxmom16

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the stickies twice now. Separate times. And they don’t seem to keep my hair in! Kind of disappointed with that.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping and packaged well... as for the product, it is pretty good. It does it’s job. And as for people saying they are short, no they are not short the white paper just pulls back in two sections.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good on application, but had two extensions come loose after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JacqM

customer_reviews.title: Stays stuck💯👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: These tapes were super easy to apply. They have held up without peeling for 6 weeks. Buy these!!! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Barajas

customer_reviews.title: Its ok for the price ans short term use
customer_reviews.text: This is average adhesive I do not believe it will stay in for 4 weeks I have ordered a new product
customer_reviews.author: shiloh ewers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic strips for extensions! Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: These extensions strips worked amazing. I was skeptical because I’m accustomed to using more of a “name brand” strip for my extensions with these exceeded my expectations! These puppies held tight!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Cameron

customer_reviews.title: These are great for the price and they last just as long as the ones from the salon
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price and they last just as long as the ones from the salon
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Works great for retaping extensions, I’ve used these many times never have failed me!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor A.

product_meta.title: Walker Tape No Shine Bonding Double Sided, 4 cm x 0.8 cm, 120 Piece (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: No shine maximum hold tape taps are specifically made for installing and keeping tape in hair extension in place. This tape with proper care will last for 4 - 10 weeks. Use this tape for all skin weft, seamless, weft and tape in hair extensions.
feature_bullets: Use this tape for all skin weft, seamless, weft and tape in hair extensions
Use as new or replacement tape for your tape in extensions
Maximum hold hair extensions tape tabs

specifications.Item model number: No Shine Bonding Double Sided Tape
